requirements.summary: Stop rendering the 14-day drinks-per-day bar chart on the Dashboard page.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard no longer renders the <DrinksChart /> section (the "14-Day History" card is not visible).
Dashboard still loads and renders the remaining sections (UnifiedHeaderSection, ChanceOfDrinkingCard, CycleWindowCard, SoberDaysSection, StatusIndicatorsSection) without layout issues.

file_operations.description: Remove the DrinksChart import and remove the JSX block that renders the "14-Day History" chart card (<DrinksChart ... />) so the bar chart is no longer displayed on the Dashboard, while keeping other dashboard sections and data fetching needed by StatusIndicatorsSection intact.
